Please draft an email of his actions and current status. Also include what plans were in motion to move him to a GP unit. It will need

From: Lamine N'Diaye [redacted]@bop.gov

Subject: Fwd: Epstein

Sent from my Verizon, Samsung Galaxy smartphone

additional_notes: The document appears to be a redacted email chain discussing Epstein's status and plans to move him to a GP unit. The redactions are likely due to privacy or security concerns.
